name: Lucy in the Sky (PartyVGames)
description:
Help Lucy surf the wild winds of this typhoon using her ol' reliable time umbrella!

Controls:

Left - Right Arrow keys = Move Lucy Horizontally

Down Arrow key = Stop Time (and let Lucy go down).

What to do:

Avoid the coming obstacles.

Prevent her from freezing to death, avoid staying too high,

Don't let Lucy hit the bottom.
